overview: The story begins with a night-club girl May jumping off from her apartment killing herself. She is suspected of being possessed by evil spirits. The landlord, Aunt Lan, rented May's room to Kate and Boopie. After they have moved into the apartment, strange things keep happening to them. And Kate is being mesmerized by a ghost. As the matter is getting worse, Jiao decides to destroy the ghost......
title: House of the Damned
